TopicTitle: Why do the "random" contract locations keep being the same part of Kerbin?

Articles.Content:
Why does this always happen?  Is the procedural generation limiting the options so only these regions ever show up in contracts?  There's lots of Kerbin out there that goes unused because of this.

 

https://imgur.com/YpFGhHd

I've gotten surface temp reading contracts in the mountains NNW of KSC and in the mountains ENE of KSC but that may have been the result of a contract mod pack.  All the aircraft overflight contracts I've gotten do seem to have fit the pattern you show, iirc
